Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.rules.dynamic

Class BaseRules

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.rules.dynamic.BaseRules
All Implemented Interfaces:
DynamicRules
Direct Known Subclasses:
CentaurRules, FarmerRules, KnightRules, MushroomRules, PostmanRules
public class BaseRules extends Object implements DynamicRules
BaseRules class represent the normal version of the game's DynamicRules, that may get modified by CharacterCards.

    • influenceComparator

      protected boolean influenceComparator(int influence1, int influence2)
      Method influence comparator checks if a player has more influence than another.
      Parameters:
      influence1 - the first player's influence.
      influence2 - the second player's influence.
      Returns:
      true if the first player has more influence, false otherwise.

    • computeIslandInfluence

      public Optional<String> computeIslandInfluence(Game game, Island island)
      Method computeIslandInfluence calculates the player with the maximum influence on that island, or Optional.Empty if no players have influence.
      Specified by:
      computeIslandInfluence in interface DynamicRules
      Parameters:
      game - the current game instance reference.
      island - the reference to the island to calculate the influence on.
      Returns:
      The nickname of the new owner, empty otherwise.
